snippet: Runners ran down the runway of John F. Kennedy International Airport as part of the airport’s annual 5K race.
abstract: JFK's Run on the Runway 5K, annual race at John F Kennedy International Airport in Queens, takes place with 1,012 runners.
lead_paragraph: Runners ran down the runway of John F. Kennedy International Airport as part of the airport’s annual 5K race.

headline.main: A Different Way of Taking Off at J.F.K.
headline.print_headline: A Different Way of Taking Off at J.F.K.
